mapper.select: SELECT m.STUDY_NO as "study.study_no", s.STUDY_NAME as "study.study_name", s.P_ADDRESS as "study.p_address", s.S_APPLICATION_PERIOD as "study.s_application_period", m.USER_ID as "user.id", m.USER_GRADE as grade FROM STUDY_MANAGEMENT m, USER_INFO u, STUDY s WHERE u.USER_ID = m.USER_ID and s.STUDY_NO = m.STUDY_NO and m.USER_ID = #{value} and s.END_DATE >= sysdate and m.USER_GRADE = 'ADMIN'
